OOC: This mail is going to seem VERY angry. All of my mails do anyway, plea=
se remember.

I honestly don't understand why this is great news. Whenever =
they announce stuff like this, I just become worried. VERY worried. What ha=
ppens if it sucks? I'll be VERY mad indeed. I think it'll be great news whe=
n the movie is out and DOESN'T suck. I'm honestly more excited about their =
next line of Transformers for 2004, their 20th anniversary line entitled Tr=
ansformers Energon. I KNOW their toys will always be good. In case you don'=
t understand where I'm coming from, I thought Beast Wars was a good show. I=
t pailed in comparison to the original Transformers, but it was good. Howev=
er, it could have been SO much better as just an ordinary cartoon like the =
original Transformers instead of computer generation. So the idea behind a =
live action movie makes me think things like "who's writing it? What's the =
budget? Will Hasbro watch over it? Will they make it as bad an adaptation a=
s The Running Man?" I know you're all thinking that I should be more optimi=
stic, but you've seen how characters can be completely warped, as proof of =
it occurred in Beast Machines. Forgive the fact that this mail was so long.=
 Also forgive the fact that I'm still working on my upcoming storylines.

 =
 ----- Original Message -----
  From: EmprzAnastazia@...
  To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com
  Sent: Wednesday, June 11, 2003 7:50 PM
  Subject: OOC: Maj=
orly great news!


  Hasbro has made an official press release of a Live Ac=
tion Transformers movie! Release date TBA. 

  Check out www.hasbro.com for=
 the press release!

  Stac
